think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the 'hash_mem_multiplier' knob in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine if it has a natural order or if it can take on special values like -1 or 0. 3. Assess whether setting this knob to a special value would change its functionality significantly compared to its regular operation. 4. Conclude if it can be classified as a special knob based on these criteria.
